video.title: XIII: The Series
video.synopsis: A highly trained former secret operative cannot remember his past. To rediscover it, he must take on missions from those he cannot trust.

episodes.synopsis: Having been locked down in a brutal rendition camp for two years by NSA Director Amos, XIII is sprung in a daring escape by mysterious allies.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: XIII and Sam follow a clue from Sheridan to Green Falls, a small town where XIII may have grown up.
episodes.title: Green Falls

episodes.synopsis: Chasing another lead from Sheridan, XIII gets himself thrown into a brutal Venezuelan prison in search of a prisoner who might have worked with him.
episodes.title: Lockdown

episodes.synopsis: XIII follows the piece of information he learned from Sanchez in the Venezuelan prison. It leads him to Ireland in search of an ex-IRA operative.
episodes.title: The Irish Job

episodes.synopsis: XIII follows the trail of his identity to Bitterroot, a paramilitary training camp in the Pacific Northwest where he supposedly trained.
episodes.title: Training Camp

episodes.synopsis: Having learned in Bitterroot that he was trained for a corporate intrusion mission in Costa Verde, XIII and Jones head off to investigate.
episodes.title: Costa Verde

episodes.synopsis: XIII and Jones travel to Chicago in search of Robert Simons, one of the other agents sent to break into the plant in Costa Verde.
episodes.title: Undertow

episodes.synopsis: Irina approaches XIII with a proposal for him to hand over one of the watches in return for the identity of the man who killed Sam.
episodes.title: Hunting Party

episodes.synopsis: XIII is hot on the trail of now-exposed CIA director Giordino and tracks him to a safe-deposit box in Moscow.
episodes.title: The Bank Job

episodes.synopsis: XIII and Jones find themselves looking for a young boy whose parents Giordino has brutally murdered.
episodes.title: The Train

episodes.synopsis: XIII and Jones go to Montana, the site of a decommissioned blast chamber full of deadly traps -- and potentially, information from the final watch.
episodes.title: The Bunker

episodes.synopsis: Having retrieved the final watch from Max Serle, XIII fits the pieces of the encrypted file together to find that it requires a password.
episodes.title: The Key

episodes.synopsis: Gerhardt has stolen the weapon from XIII and is bent on using it to undermine world powers to his benefit.
episodes.title: Revelation

episodes.synopsis: XIII joins the activist anti-globalization group The Veil. He soon descends into a dark psychosis of violence and terrorism -- or does he?
episodes.title: Phoenix

episodes.synopsis: Synequanon reels from the bombing of its headquarters and The Veil and XIII are labeled as terrorists. Later, XIII is captured by a mysterious figure.
episodes.title: Rampage

episodes.synopsis: Hunted by the Government, Synequanon and the mysterious XIII searches for clues to the vast global conspiracy unfolding before them.
episodes.title: Defender

episodes.synopsis: Racing against the Synequanon security team, XIII tracks down a scientist, a prisoner of the corporation with a connection to the mysterious letters.
episodes.title: Tempest

episodes.synopsis: XIII and Amos grapple physically and mentally as they attempt to discover the truth behind the bombing of Synequanon's headquarters.
episodes.title: Joust

episodes.synopsis: XIII crashes an ultra-exclusive party hosted by a psychotic Russian oligarch to secure a Tesla letter.
episodes.title: Gauntlet

episodes.synopsis: XIII, Betty and Mozambique rush to free Vargas before he's deported to Guantanamo.
episodes.title: Breakout

episodes.synopsis: Betty is abducted and delivered to her father and his cronies. XIII searches for the final letter aboard a ship sailing to China.
episodes.title: Mousetrap

episodes.synopsis: As XIII gets closer to destroying the HEARPE weapon, his life depends on his ability to seamlessly take over Victor Gong's (XIII.2's) identity.
episodes.title: Pong

episodes.synopsis: XIII undergoes a face-altering operation and comes to believe he really is Victor Gong (XIII.2). Meanwhile, Betty allies herself with the real XIII.2.
episodes.title: Widow

episodes.synopsis: Thrown into an illegal fighting pit by Betty, XIII tries to rally the other prisoners -- including Amos, Mozambique and Grier -- to mount an escape.
episodes.title: Blackout

episodes.synopsis: XIII, Betty and Amos try to escape Shanghai but are caught in a mysterious city-wide riot that has spontaneously formed around them.
episodes.title: Berserk

episodes.synopsis: XIII, Betty and Barnabis rush to stop the fully operational Chinese HEARPE machine before it unleashes its destructive force on the United States.
episodes.title: Battlezone
